# Vendor Libraries

This project uses CDN links for most dependencies. The local vendor files are kept as fallbacks.

## Dependencies Used:
- Bootstrap 3.4.1
- jQuery 3.x
- Font Awesome 4.x
- DataTables
- SweetAlert
- Parsley.js (form validation)
- Moment.js
- DatePicker

## For Production:
Consider using CDN links for faster loading:
- Bootstrap: https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.4.1/
- jQuery: https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.5.1/
- Font Awesome: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/

Local files are provided as fallback for offline development.
